column4: Hi, I have a dedicated server running windows xp, i dont have access to be infront of the machine, can i network install and setup without being there in person?
yeah thats all i wanna do is webhosting
i was gonna use apache for winblows
you will need to boot to some form of install media, if you had a DRAC card in the system you can do it 100% remotely (assuming you use Dell hardware ;))
